attributes.action: Revoke visas of families of Russians connected with the Kremlin.
attributes.additional_details: Whilst it is welcome news that the 'golden visa' scheme, whereby the right to stay in this country could be bought by super wealthy foreigners, we need to show our opposition to the outrages in Ukraine by revoking  visas previously granted to the families of those supporting Putin.
attributes.background: It is not acceptable that the Russian elite enjoy a lavish lifestyle in this country while the Russian state commits war crimes in Ukraine.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610058
